item.title: Event Sourcing
item.description: my-event-store-demo Architecture Diagram How to Run Build your project ./gradlew clean build --info Start Zookeeper zookeeper-server-start /Users/dennis.dao/workspace/app/kafka_2.13-2.8.0/config/zookeeper.properties Start Kafka kafka-server-start /Users/dennis.dao/workspace/app/kafka_2.13-2.8.0/config/server.properties Run app with spring profile property spring.profiles.active: api-gateway-service = default Access your Eureka Naming Server at http://localhost:8761/ User: admin Password: password naming-server = default Option 1: event-storage-service connects to kafka cluster topic to process the event. default or h2 rocksdb command-service = camel-kafka with remote or local kafka broker: local loopback host: spring.
